detail_desc: Vest top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend.

Blouse in a cotton weave with a deep neckline that has gathers at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and a seam with concealed elastication under the bust.
Shorts in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Ankle-length trousers in sturdy jersey. High, elasticated paper bag waist with a small frill trim and sewn-on tie belt at the front. Side pockets and tapered legs.
Cycling shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Cycling shorts in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.

Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill. High waist with belt loops, a zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and wide legs with pleats at the top and hems for added volume. Close-fitting cuffs at the hems.
Yoga socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with anti-slip protectors on the soles. Holes for the toes and crossover straps over the feet.
Sleeveless, straight-cut, knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back. Unlined.
Sleeveless, straight-cut, knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back. Unlined.
Sleeveless, straight-cut, knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back. Unlined.
Sleeveless, straight-cut, knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back. Unlined.
Sleeveless, straight-cut, knee-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck front and back. Unlined.

Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the sweatshirt is organic. The polyester content is partly recycled.

Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the sweatshirt is organic. The polyester content is partly recycled.

Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the sweatshirt is organic. The polyester content is partly recycled.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Flounces with an overlocked edge around the shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Flounces with an overlocked edge around the shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Blouse in slub-weave viscose with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with smocked trims.
Blouse in slub-weave viscose with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with smocked trims.
Blouse in slub-weave viscose with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with smocked trims.

Blouse in slub-weave viscose with a V-neck, buttons down the front and short puff sleeves with smocked trims.

Short dress in a lightly crêped weave with a wrapover section at the bust. Sweetheart neckline, smocking at the back and long puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders and at the hems. Unlined.

Short dress in a lightly crêped weave with a wrapover section at the bust. Sweetheart neckline, smocking at the back and long puff sleeves with elastication over the shoulders and at the hems. Unlined.

Set with two T-shirts and a pair of trousers in soft cotton jersey and a pair of shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric. T-shirts with press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and narrow ribbing around the neckline. Trousers and shorts with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Oversized shorts in cotton twill. High waist with covered elastication at the back and pleats at the front, and a zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and wide, knee-length legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Oversized shorts in cotton twill. High waist with covered elastication at the back and pleats at the front, and a zip fly and button. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets and wide, knee-length legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, buttons at the top and short, wide sleeves. Pin-tucks at the front and shoulders, and a seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined.
Knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, buttons at the top and short, wide sleeves. Pin-tucks at the front and shoulders, and a seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined.

Jacket in washed cotton denim with sequined sections. Collar, buttons down the front, a V-shaped yoke, flap chest pockets with a button and discreet side pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Slingbacks in imitation suede with pointed toes, satin linings and imitation leather insoles.
Slingbacks in imitation suede with pointed toes, satin linings and imitation leather insoles.
Slides with a wide foot strap in imitation suede and a metal buckle. Moulded insoles and chunky, fluted soles. The polyester content of the slides is partly recycled.
Sandals in imitation leather with square toes and narrow straps that cross over the foot and go around the ankle. Adjustable fastening with a small metal buckle. Finely fluted soles.
Sandals in imitation leather with square toes and narrow straps that cross over the foot and go around the ankle. Adjustable fastening with a small metal buckle. Finely fluted soles.
Short skirt in a cotton weave. High waist with wide smocking and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Lined.
Short skirt in linen with a high waist, D-ring belt and buttons down the front. Large flap patch pockets at the front. Unlined.
Short skirt in linen with a high waist, D-ring belt and buttons down the front. Large flap patch pockets at the front. Unlined.
Alice band covered in braided satin with metal flowers decorated with plastic beads and glass rhinestones.
Stylish, fitted top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Stylish, fitted top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Stylish, fitted top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Stylish, fitted top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.

Oversized shirt jacket in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button and diagonal side pockets. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.

Oversized shirt jacket in woven fabric with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button and diagonal side pockets. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.

Biker jacket in imitation leather with a diagonal zip down the front, a yoke and notch lapels with decorative press-studs. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs and zipped front pockets. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.

Long dress in a cool cotton and silk weave with a round, neckline with gathers for added width. Concealed buttons at the top, short, wide raglan sleeves and a gathered seam at the hem for extra width.

Long dress in a cool cotton and silk weave with a round, neckline with gathers for added width. Concealed buttons at the top, short, wide raglan sleeves and a gathered seam at the hem for extra width.

Maxi dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Low-cut back with a concealed zip, a seam at the waist and an airy skirt with a slit at the front. Unlined.

Maxi dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Low-cut back with a concealed zip, a seam at the waist and an airy skirt with a slit at the front. Unlined.

Lightly padded parka in cotton twill with a high collar and lined hood with a folding trim around the edge. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, handwarmer pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Drawstring at the waist and a tab with a press-stud at the cuffs. Quilted lining.

Lightly padded parka in cotton twill with a high collar and lined hood with a folding trim around the edge. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, handwarmer pockets with a flap and concealed press-stud, and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Drawstring at the waist and a tab with a press-stud at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
Vest top in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with decorative buttons at the top.
Vest top in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with decorative buttons at the top.
Vest top in soft, ribbed, organic cotton jersey with decorative buttons at the top.
Fitted, smocked blouse in woven fabric with a frill-trimmed boat neck, long, voluminous puff sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs, and a frill trim at the hem.
Fitted, smocked blouse in woven fabric with a frill-trimmed boat neck, long, voluminous puff sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs, and a frill trim at the hem.
Skater skirt in fine, textured-knit cotton with concealed elastication at the waist and a stocking-stitched hem.
Skater skirt in fine, textured-knit cotton with concealed elastication at the waist and a stocking-stitched hem.

Blouse in crisp cotton poplin with a V-neck at the front and square neckline at the back. Wrapover front with ties at one side and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the shoulders and hems.

Wide, straight-cut shirt in a crisp cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and gathered yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, short, wide sleeves in a double layer for added volume, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed cotton denim. Relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch, button fly and roomy legs with raw-edge hems.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed cotton denim. Relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch, button fly and roomy legs with raw-edge hems.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed cotton denim. Relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch, button fly and roomy legs with raw-edge hems.
Shorts in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and diagonal side pockets.
Shorts in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist and diagonal side pockets.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Fully lined, textured swimsuit.
Boxy-style T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline and sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Knitted jacket in soft, thermal fleece with a hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and jersey trims at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Padded gilet in a patterned weave. Detachable hood with ears on top, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Lined.

Patterned jacket in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. High collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, long raglan sleeves and jersey trims at the cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jacket is partly recycled.

Jacket in soft faux shearling with jersey trims, a stand-up collar and concealed zip with an imitation leather tab and a chin guard. Front pockets and long raglan sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
